title: SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Assistant Professor Posts
description: Swami Vivekanand National Institute of Rehabilitation Training and Research (SVNIRTAR Cuttack) has introduced the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Assistant Professor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Phil/ Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025. Interested ...
